          <title>
            <string language="hu">Uruk edény, Kr. e. 4. évezred, British Museum</string>
            <string language="en">Uruk'a bowl, 4. thousand years befor Christ,  British Museum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Uruk'a Schüssel, 4. tausend Jahre befor Christ,

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cuvette d'Uruk'a, 4. mille ans de befor le

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bacia de Uruk'a, 4. mil anos de befor Christ,

            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciotola di Uruk'a, 4. mila anni di befor Christ,

          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A késő Uruk-korból származó korongolt, festett csőrös kancsó</string>
            <string language="en">A wheeld, painted, beaked jug from the late age of Uruk</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Tiziano Vecellio,  Vlence,  cinquecento,  </string>
            <string language="en">Tiziano Vecellio,  Vlence,  cinquecento,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein wheeld, gemalt, beaked Krug vom späten Alter
von Uruk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un wheeld, cruche peinte et rostrée de 
l'âge en retard d'Uruk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um wheeld, pintado, beaked o jarro da idade 
atrasada de Uruk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un wheeld, verniciato, beaked la brocca dall'età

edad de Uruk</string>
